mapper.insert: insert into admin_info (admin_info_id, admin_name, admin_sex, admin_phonenumber, other) values (#{adminInfoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adminName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminPhonenumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{other,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

insert into admin_info
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS admin_info_id
admin_info_id,
admin_name,
admin_sex,
admin_phonenumber,
other,

#{adminName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update admin_info
admin_name = #{adminName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
admin_sex = #{adminSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
admin_phonenumber = #{adminPhonenumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
other = #{other,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where admin_info_id = #{adminInfoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT admin_name,admin_sex,admin_phonenumber FROM account a LEFT JOIN admin b ON a.account_id = b.account_id LEFT JOIN admin_info c ON b.admin_info_id = c.admin_info_id WHERE a.account_id = #{accountId}
